## FieldTextInput.setSpellcheck() method

Set whether this field is spellchecked by the browser.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setSpellcheck(check: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  check | boolean | True if checked. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
